segments.text: I notice the boy is really stretching to reach those cookies, standing on his tiptoes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool he's on looks so unstable, like it could topple any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, hand outstretched, waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a bit annoyed at how careless they're being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their mom is right there, but she's completely unaware of what's going on behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and she's standing in it, drying dishes like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's ever going to notice the mess or the kids' mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so serene, it's a stark contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I'm watching a scene from a silent movie, where everything is exaggerated and dramatic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn't fall and hurt himself, that would be terrible.
segments.speaker: PAR
